sections.description: Project related components
Snippets of reusable CSS to develop faster and keep code readable
@include gradient-reset-filter();
@include rgba-ie($color, $alpha);

Dividers (basically an hr) within dropdowns and nav lists

@include nav-divider($top: #e5e5e5, $bottom: $white);

Vertically center elements in the navbar. Example: an element has a height of 30px, so write out .navbarVerticalAlign(30px); to calculate the appropriate top margin.

@include navbarVerticalAlign($elementHeight);

https://gist.github.com/3166895 http://compass-style.org/reference/compass/helpers/sprites/

@include get-sprite($map, $sprite, $bg-color: transparent, $repeat: no-repeat, $height: true, $width: true);
@include cf();

Create a triangle.

@include triangle($color, $orientation, $width, $height);

Create an animation with vendor prefixes

@include animation($value);

Define simple button styles

@include button();

Requires inline-block or block for proper styling

@include text-overflow;

Kellum Method: http://www.zeldman.com/2012/03/01/replacing-the-9999px-hack-new-image-replacement Additional helpers from http://html5boilerplate.com/docs/css/ This is also included as a SASS mixin, see: sass/custom.rb see also http://css-tricks.com/examples/ImageReplacement/

@include ir;

Create an empty css pseudo element. Reusable for, e.g., icons

@include el($width: 100%, $height: 100%, $display: block);
@include stripes($color1: red, $color2: blue, $angle: -45deg);

section.description: Project related components
Snippets of reusable CSS to develop faster and keep code readable
@include gradient-reset-filter();
@include rgba-ie($color, $alpha);

Dividers (basically an hr) within dropdowns and nav lists

@include nav-divider($top: #e5e5e5, $bottom: $white);

Vertically center elements in the navbar. Example: an element has a height of 30px, so write out .navbarVerticalAlign(30px); to calculate the appropriate top margin.

@include navbarVerticalAlign($elementHeight);

https://gist.github.com/3166895 http://compass-style.org/reference/compass/helpers/sprites/

@include get-sprite($map, $sprite, $bg-color: transparent, $repeat: no-repeat, $height: true, $width: true);
@include cf();

Create a triangle.

@include triangle($color, $orientation, $width, $height);

Create an animation with vendor prefixes

@include animation($value);

Define simple button styles

@include button();

Requires inline-block or block for proper styling

@include text-overflow;

Kellum Method: http://www.zeldman.com/2012/03/01/replacing-the-9999px-hack-new-image-replacement Additional helpers from http://html5boilerplate.com/docs/css/ This is also included as a SASS mixin, see: sass/custom.rb see also http://css-tricks.com/examples/ImageReplacement/
